# Pull Request

## Description

Please provide a clear description of your changes and what problem they solve.

## Type of Change

Please check the relevant option:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Related Issues

Fixes #(issue_number)

## Changes Made

- [ ] List your changes here
- [ ] Use bullet points
- [ ] Be specific

## Testing

Please describe the tests you ran to verify your changes:

- [ ] Tested on CMSMS version: _____
- [ ] Tested on PHP version: _____
- [ ] Tested migration with sample data
- [ ] Verified error handling
- [ ] Checked admin log entries
- [ ] Tested with both new and existing instances

- CMSMS Version:
- PHP Version:

## Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Additional Notes

Add any additional context or notes about the pull request here.

## Migration Impact

If this PR affects migration functionality:

- [ ] Migration process still works correctly
- [ ] Existing migrations are not affected
- [ ] New migrations work as expected
- [ ] Logging is still functional
- [ ] Error handling is preserved

## Breaking Changes

If this PR contains breaking changes, please list them here and explain migration path:

## Documentation Updates

- [ ] README.md updated
- [ ] Documentation in docs/ folder updated
- [ ] Help.inc updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Language files updated (if applicable)

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code is under 500 lines per file (or split into modules)
- [ ] No hardcoded values (uses config.php or preferences)
- [ ] Proper error handling implemented
- [ ] Security considerations addressed
- [ ] PHP 7.4-8.6 compatible

**By submitting this pull request, I confirm that:**

1. I have read and understood the contribution guidelines
2. My code is ready for review
3. All tests pass
4. Documentation has been updated
